verses.name: Mark 13:20
verses.text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days, no flesh should be saved: but for the elect’s sake, whom he hath chosen, he hath shortened the days.

verses.name: Mark 13:21
verses.text: And then if any man shall say to you, Lo, here is Christ; or, lo, he is there; believe him not:

verses.name: Mark 13:22
verses.text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise, and shall shew signs and wonders, to seduce, if it were possible, even the elect.

verses.name: Mark 13:23
verses.text: But take ye heed: behold, I have foretold you all things.
